snippet.title: Cursed to Golf - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist upcoming golf-like Cursed to Golf at https://bit.ly/cursed2g

Liam Edwards, game Director at Chuhai Labs gives the lowdown on Cursed to Golf, a roguelike golf adventure that tasks the player with ridding themselves of an ancient curse and making it out of Golf Purgatory to become a Golfing Legend. With its beau-tee-ful pixel art, hole-some story and innovative gameplay, Cursed to Golf is a real hole-in-one. Coming soon to both PC and Nintendo Switch.
